examples.korean: His father, James, a wizard, his mother Lilly, a witch, are murdered by an evil dark lord. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 마법사였던 아버지 제임스와, 마녀였던 어머니 릴리는 어둠의 마왕에게 살해됩니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His father, James, a wizard, his mother Lilly, a witch, are murdered by an evil dark lord. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Black is doubly dangerous as he is also a friend of Lord Voldemort. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 블랙은 또한 어둠의 마왕 볼드모트의 친구로서 두 배로 위험하다. Neungyule
examples.english: Black is doubly dangerous as he is also a friend of Lord Voldemort. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He also hears that Black is the one who told Lord Voldemort where his parents were hiding before they were murdered. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 또한 블랙이 어둠의 마왕 볼드모트에게 그들의 부모님이 살해 되기 전 숨어 있던 곳을 알려준 사람이라는 것도 듣게 된다. Neungyule
examples.english: He also hears that Black is the one who told Lord Voldemort where his parents were hiding before they were murdered. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The novel begins with the defeat of the evil dark wizard Lord Voldemort, who had just tried to kill a one-year-old boy named Harry Potter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 소설은 해리 포터라는 이름의 한 살짜리 아이를 이제 막 죽이려고 한, 사악하고 음흉한 마법사인 마왕 볼드모트의 패배로부터 시작된다. Neungyule
examples.english: The novel begins with the defeat of the evil dark wizard Lord Voldemort, who had just tried to kill a one-year-old boy named Harry Potter. Add to Wordbook
